wordGroup: toll-free number 免费电话；免税数

sentences.en: Every entrance ticket lists a toll-free number for counseling from the Indiana Department of Mental Health.
sentences.cn: 每张入场券上都列有一个印第安纳心理健康部免费咨询的电话号码。

sentences.en: And it gives users the option of booking the hotel through a toll-free number, 800-468-3578. A helpful person answers promptly.
sentences.cn: 它提供一个免费的酒店预订电话：800-468-3578，并且会有人及时地接听，提供帮助。
